thread.section_title: Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great value for money
thread.title_full: Great value for money - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Tony J
title: Great value for money
text:
We were 2 adults and 2 teenagers - in one room - and the room was big enough to accomodate us all. We had a great view - 16th floor - looking at Empire state and the Crysler building - and breakfast was a perfect start of long days with lots of walking. Coming from Europe - you wake up early - so perfect that Breakfast is from 6 AM.
Very good value for money!!
Room Tip: Higher floors less street noice - and uptown view is excellent from higher floors See more room tips
